data.eml:eml: Review of the Nearctic (north of Mexico) species of Elacatis Pascoe (Coleoptera: Salpingidae: Othniinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pollock, Darren A. (2018): Review of the Nearctic (north of Mexico) species of Elacatis Pascoe (Coleoptera: Salpingidae: Othniinae). Zootaxa 4420 (3): 301-333, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4420.3.1
